sentences.sContent: Therefore, its floral language is flamboyance.
sentences.sCn: 因此，它的花语就是-华丽。

sentences.sContent: Dad was resplendent in dark blue pants and a white short-sleeved shirt, providing a quiet background for Mom’s flamboyance. We all piled into the car.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dad was resplendent in dark blue pants and a white short-sleeved shirt, providing a quiet background for Mom’s flamboyance. We all piled into the car.
sentences.sCn: 爸爸穿的身份华丽，一条深蓝色的裤子和白色的短袖衬衫，很好的映衬了妈妈的艳丽。

words.tran: 艳丽的；火焰似的；炫耀的
火炬；有装饰的、华丽的大烛台
